panel.subtitle: Coins from the Kingdom of Jerusalem
panel.body: Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat existentie es un myth. Por scientie, musica, sport etc, litot Europa usa li sam vocabular. Li lingues differe solmen in li grammatica, li pronunciation e li plu commun vocabules.

panel.subtitle: Two Oliphants
panel.body: This Cultural and Commercial exchange that this object shows is interesting in many ways. It is a good example of the ways goods can travel and be re-interpreted across regions and belief systems.

panel.subtitle: Tiles showing Richard and Saladin
panel.body: The Tiles were designed as a part of a series showing key figures of the Crusades. They reflect how crusading narratives were later remembered and reshaped.
